successes.title: Dungeon Roll - A Dicey Dungeon Delve
successes.description: A vicious dragon is out there... Assemble your party at the tavern... Slay the dragon! Grab the treasure! OH GLORIOUS GLORY!!!

Pledges.description: ADVENTURER - 1 copy of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE USA. Add +$15 per additional copy of Dungeon Roll.
CANADIAN ADVENTURER - 1 copy of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WITHIN CANADA. Add +$23 per additional copy of Dungeon Roll.
INTERNATIONAL ADVENTURER - 1 copy of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. Add +$29 per additional copy of Dungeon Roll.

GOLD SUPPORTER - 1 copy of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. Personal credit in the "Book of Heroes" as a Gold Supporter. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE FOR 1 COPY. Additional copies of Dungeon Roll available based on region, just add to your pledge level as follows: +$15 in the USA.  +$21 Canada. +$25 worldwide.

ADVENTURER x 6 - 6 copies of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE USA. All copies include achieved stretch goals (which is true of all copies obtained through Kickstarter). Works out to be a buy 5, get the 6th free!
INTERNATIONAL COMBO PACK - 6 Copies of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. No add-ons available.

PLATINUM SUPPORTER + LIMITED EDITION SIGNED POSTER - You will receive 1 copy of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. Personal credit in the "Book of Heroes" as a Platinum Supporter. One LIMITED EDITION poster signed by the entire Dungeon Roll team and numbered appropriately. There will only be a maximum of 150 signed and numbered posters, 100 without sketches and 50 with sketches. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE for 1 copy of Dungeon Roll and 1 poster. Additional copies of Dungeon Roll available based on region, just add to your pledge level, as follows: +$15 in the USA.  +$19 Canada. +$23 worldwide.

DIAMOND SUPPORTER + LIMITED EDITION SIGNED POSTER WITH SKETCHES - You will receive 1 copy of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. Personal credit in the "Book of Heroes" as a Diamond Supporter. One LIMITED EDITION poster signed by the entire Dungeon Roll team, with sketches from each artist involved and numbered appropriately. There will only be a maximum of 150 signed and numbered posters, 100 without sketches and 50 with sketches. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE for 1 copy of Dungeon Roll and 1 poster. Additional copies of Dungeon Roll available based on region, just add to your pledge level.  +$15 in the USA.  +$15 Canada. +$20 worldwide.
2X INTERNATIONAL COMBO PACK - 12 Copies of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. No add-ons games available. All games will include the stretch rewards.

3X INTERNATIONAL COMBO PACK - 18 Copies of Dungeon Roll, a dicey dungeon delve. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. No add-ons games available. All games will include the stretch rewards, just like with all of the other pledges.
